channel.title: Career on Reza Safari
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Reza Safari

item.title: T-Shaped Data Professional or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Specialist
item.description: Data Science is one of the few interdisciplinary fields which can always use specialists with a broad general knowledge, and a specialization that brings a unique flavor to the formula. Here’s why we should aspire to be T-Shaped professionals
